tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterUsageData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  usage_date DATE,
  usage_time TIME,
  gallons_used INT,
  is_compliant BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE water_meters (
  meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_id INT NOT NULL,
  reading_date DATE NOT NULL,
  usage_gallons INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES water_sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE water_compliance (
  compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meter_id INT NOT NULL,
  regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
  compliance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES water_meters(meter_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES water_regulations(regulation_id)
);
